text:
My child has been with Kinderland Sunshine Place since 2019 infant care to now 2024 K2 full day.

My child is happy to go school and enjoy meeting his classmates and schoolmates.

Non teaching Staffs and Teachers has nourish my child growth and patients towards my child. No doubt that my child is mischievous at times.

They do take feedback seriously.

Thank you staffs and Teachers at Kinderland Sunshine Place!

every month will send reminder to beg for referral without fail. school app also doesn’t allow you to initiate to msg, reasons given was “if the app allow you to msg then school will be very busy because every parent will send msg to teachers”.

My daughter has flourished at Kinderland since infant care, and now in Nursery, I've witnessed her grow into a happy and confident child. The infant care teachers showed immense care and love, while the Pn1 to Nursery teachers have been exceptional - dedicated, patient, and truly invested in each child's development. I appreciate the strong rapport I have with the teachers and my daughter's enthusiasm for coming to school every day. The teachers are all very approachable and sincere. The school's emphasis on making learning fun and engaging is impressive, and I value their welcoming approach to parent involvement. The celebrations and events are always enjoyable, fostering a sense of community among parents and teachers. Thank you, Kinderland, for providing a nurturing environment where my child can thrive. I'm grateful for the teachers' and staff's dedication and hard work!
The administrative staff and teachers are really attentive to the children. Although my child joined them for less than 3 months, but he totally enjoyed himself at the centre.
The school has taught my son lots of values for the past 4 years. His social skills improved and i recommend the educators there. :)
